column4: ok... different form of maybe the same question...do I need to open ports on my router for traceroute to work?
if you could access the internet just fine, then traceroute should go through without opening new ports, I think.
that's what I thought too, but traceroute from command line says traceroute not found, and using the gui tool it just times out
Possibly. After all, that's the purpose of traceroute - to see if it gets halted at some point.
